title: Riyadh Mezher
text: Riyadh Mezher is a former <a href="Iraqi%20people">Iraqi</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a> who played for <a href="Iraq%20national%20football%20team">Iraq</a> in the <a href="1999%20Pan%20Arab%20Games">1999 Pan Arab Games</a>. He played for Iraq between 1999 and 2002.
